name: Sport Man Games 2008 (2020 Remastered Ultimate Edition)
name_original: Sport Man Games 2008 (2020 Remastered Ultimate Edition)
description:
I can't believe it's been 12 years since the jaw-dropping 2008 Sport Man Games. Known for it's beautiful and accurate recreation of the real-life Sport Man Games,  this classic has been referenced and played for years. 

Now, with the 2020 Remastered Ultimate Edition, you can relive the magic that was 2008 with modern, 2020 style graphics made possible by Bitsy. 

Plus, the 2020 Remastered Ultimate Edition will feature an incredible Omega Team update, collect all your favourite Sport Men for the mere price of $4,000 each. A complete bargain. That update will be coming in the future. 

Now with a cameo from Michael Jordan!*

Music from Komiku via freemusicarchive.org

(Please provide feedback this is my first game thank you)

*The fictional character Michael Jordan featured in this game has no affiliation with any other Michael Jordan's in the world, it is a common name and it's actually your fault for thinking it would be a different Michael Jordan.
